name: 网格与命令GridGuider DEMO
description:
在网格与命令中你可以通过操纵玩家移动，匹配右侧的命令。

如果每行都一致那么将会可以通过关卡，相反，每行都出现了×那么游戏失败，

出界也会死亡。请耐心的解开谜题吧。

新关卡代码将会以字符串形式出现在评论区。评论和邮件c14jiang@163.com可以联系我

In the Grid Guider you can manipulate the player to move, match the command on the right.

If every line is the same then you will be able to pass the level, on the contrary, every line appears × then the game fails.

Out of bounds will also lead to death. Please patiently solve the puzzle!

The new level code will appear as strings in the comment section. You can contact me by comments or by email c14jiang@163.com.
